name: Samambaia.2
description:
This fern is native in Brazil, and it's used in traditional medicine as an antiulcere agente. The whole plant can be used in infusion, or simply chew the roots (with regards and limits). I point once again: do not eat any kind of plant if you not know it well or not sure about the species.

ID: Migrogramma squamulosa | Family: Polypodiaceae

I'm a brazilian woman artist, you can find me at twitter by @ocvvvlta.
